description: Try our easy to follow Beef Pot Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Pot Roast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg black pepper & thyme beef roast

recipeInstructions.text: Place casserole over medium heat. Add butter and stir for 1 minute or until melted. Add flour and stir until well combined. Cook for 1 minute. Slowly add reserved cooking liquid, whisking constantly until smooth. Bring mixture to the boil and cook for 3 minutes or until thickened. Slice beef and serve with vegetables, steamed greens and gravy.
